Class RestfulXmlSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.impl.RestfulSession
      • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.impl.RestfulXmlSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Session

    public class RestfulXmlSession
extends RestfulSession

    Concrete implementation of RestfulSession for web services which send responses back as XML.

    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 05/21/12

      • registerDeserializer

        public <T> Session registerDeserializer(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                               Deserializer<T> deserializer)
        Description copied from interface: Session
        Registers the given Deserializer for the given Class type. Registering a Deserializer for a Class which already has a Deserializer registered for it will result in the previous Deserializer being overridden.
        Parameters:
        type - the Class to associate this deserializer with
        deserializer - the Deserializer to use when deserializing Objects of the given type
        Returns:
        Session to allow chaining
